```{r, my_setup, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
2+2

library(languageR)
library(tidyverse)
data(package = "languageR")
str(spanish)
```

```{r}
new_data <-spanish %>%
  select(., x = X14466gll, y = X14459gll) 

new_data %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x= x , y = y )) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm')

my_fit2 <- lm (y ~ x, data = new_data)
summary(my_fit2)

```
